title: Calories in 1 Oz Chicken Breast
meta_description: Discover calories in 1 oz chicken breast, including protein, fat, carbs, full nutrition breakdown, and preparation tweaks for accurate tracking.
assumptions: Skinless, boneless chicken breast, cooked (roasted or grilled), no sauce/oil added; 1 oz â‰ˆ 28 g.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, cut, cooking method, seasoning, water content, and measurement; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 1 oz cooked, skinless chicken breast has ~47 kcal and ~9 g protein.

label_note: Totals are scaled from the per-100 g basis and mirror Nutrition Facts fields.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp olive oil per oz

faqs.q: How many calories in 1 oz cooked chicken breast?
faqs.a: About 47 kcal for 1 oz skinless, cooked chicken breast.

faqs.q: What's the protein in 1 oz chicken breast?
Does 1 oz chicken breast have carbs?
faqs.a: 0 g carbs, making it ideal for low-carb diets.

faqs.q: How does cooking method affect calories in 1 oz chicken breast?
faqs.a: Grilling or roasting keeps it low; frying or adding oil increases by 40+ kcal.

faqs.q: Is 1 oz chicken breast raw or cooked weight?
faqs.a: Values here are for cooked; raw is slightly higher in water content but similar post-cooking.
